title: Bondi terror attack latest update | 9 News Australia
description: 16 people, including one of the gunmen, have been confirmed dead in a mass shooting on a Hanukkah event at Bondi Beach, a 10-year-old girl is among those killed. Hospitals across Sydney are treating 42 patients, with four of them being children. title: Bondi Terror Attack: New details on shooters, and injury toll rises | 9 News Australia
description: Sixteen people are confirmed dead, including one gunman, and 42 injured following a terror attack at a Hanukkah celebration at Bondi Beach. Police identified the gunmen as father and son, Sajid and Naveed Akram, who travelled from Western Sydney to target the event. Authorities have launched extensive raids in Bonnyrigg and Campsie. NSW Premier Chris Minns and Police Commissioner Mal Lanyon addressed the public, confirming a massive security operation is underway to protect the community. | *Subscribe and ðŸ””: http://9Soci.al/KM6e50GjSK9* *Get more breaking news at 9News.com.au: http://9Soci.al/iyCO50GjSK6*  CHAPTERS | KEY MOMENTS IN THIS VIDEO 00:00 Breaking News: 16 Dead in Bondi Terror Attack  00:36 Police Raids in Bonnyrigg and Campsie  01:17 Casualty Update: 42 Injured, Including Children  02:13 Shooters Identified as Father and Son  03:36 Prime Minister Visits the Scene  04:41 Live from St Vincent's Hospital  06:08 Interview: Dave Sharma on the Tragedy  13:26 NSW Police Commissioner Mal Lanyon Update  16:03 NSW Premier Chris Minns Address  19:45 Police Minister Yasmin Catley Statement  FOLLOW 9News Australia â–º Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/9News/ â–º Twitter: https://twitter.com/9NewsAUS â–º Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/9news/  Join 9News for the latest in news and events that affect you in your local city, as well as news from across Australia and the world.  #9News #BreakingNews #NineNewsAustralia #9NewsAU
